sentences.sContent: What about the other parts of the cuticle?
sentences.sContent_eng: What about the other parts of the cuticle?
sentences.sCn: 有关的角质层的其他部分呢？

sentences.sContent: What about the other parts of the cuticle? What should you be looking for?
sentences.sContent_eng: What about the other parts of the cuticle? What should you be looking for?
sentences.sCn: 有关的角质层的其他部分呢？你应该关注什么？

sentences.sContent: When the trap door shuts, the plant excretes mucilage next to a special cuticle around the door, creating a watertight seal.
sentences.sContent_eng: When the trap door shuts, the plant excretes mucilage next to a special cuticle around the door, creating a watertight seal.
sentences.sCn: 当陷阱阀门关闭的时候，植物在阀门周围的特殊角质层上分泌粘液，形成不透水密封垫。

words.tran: 使充满蜡状质，使角质化

trans.tranOther: Your cuticles are the skin at the base of each of your nails
